---
category: news
title: "Chinese researchers develop world's first all-analog photoelectronic chip"
excerpt: "Analog Chip Combining Electronic and Light Computing,\" harnesses the synergistic advantages of light (in the form of photons) and electricity (through electric currents) in an all-analog manner. The chip's integrated photoelectronic processor enables it to process computer vision tasks at an unprecedented speed and energy efficiency."
